tearDown

public void tearDown(boolean testWasSuccessful)
              throws Exception
Cleans up after a unit test. This method should only be called once per object.

Parameters:
testWasSuccessful - tells the object to do additional consistency checks to make sure that the test (which was successful so far) did not leave any resources in an inconsistent state

Exception
